page.title: 06HOTELS and GUEST HOUSES.
page.content: HOTELS AND GUEST HOUSES. The proximity of the{National Exhibition Centre}and the{Royal Showground}bring many {business people}to the town in addition to{large numbers of tourists. There are many{quality hotels}and {guest houses}to accommodate these visitors from the modern, multi-storied{"De Montfort Hotel"}to the 100 year-old{"Laurels Guest House" situated near to the south entrance to the Castle.{Other visitors}to the town include many{Americans}and quite a large number of{foreign students and {lecturers}attached to the nearby {University of Warwick.}The town boasts many top{quality restaurants}which {cater}not only for{Kenilworth {residents}but also for our many {visitors} which often include{visiting {families}from{our twin town in France {- Bourg-la-Reine.
